sect2.title: From v4.x to v5.x (TODO: ...)
sect2.para:
The following list shows the steps that are needed to migrate from PerfCake version 4.x to 5.x:
Rename scenario XML schema namespace
The following sections describe each step in detail.

simplesect.title: Rename XML schema namespace
simplesect.para: The namespace of the XML schema for scenarios has been renamed from urn:perfcake:scenario:3.0 to urn:perfcake:scenario:4.0 so it must be updated in the scenario XML files.
